title: (x) The New York Times Magazine fonts - Cheltenham, Stymie, Memphis, Stempel Garamond {Florian, Jan E}
content:
Hi everyone,

I need to know what are these fonts used for the NYT Magazine.

The body text seems to be something like a Stempel Garamond, but I'm not sure...

How about the other ones? any suggestions?

Thanks
